homepage.description: Welcome to Jane Total Wellness app, we are working hard to bring you the best experience possible for you and come along with you on the journey to a healthy body, mind and soul.

EditForm.ImageSaved: Your profile photo has been successfully updated
EditForm.InfoUpdate: Your health information has been successfully updated
EditForm.PasswordUpdate: Your password has been successfully updated, new password will be valid next time you login
EditForm.ProfileDeleted: We are sad to see you go, keep yourself active and healthy
EditForm.ProfileLegend: This information will be shown only to the admins.
EditForm.HealthLegend: Medical background, chronic health issues, treatments, etc. If you have any doctor's certificate please share it with me in person.
EditForm.AddressLegend: Use an address where you live most of the year.
EditForm.PasswordLegend: We recommend you to change your password at least twice a year
EditForm.EraseProfile: Erase my profile or forget my page settings
EditForm.EraseLegend: Here you can forget all your default settings, like passwords and language preference, also completely remove your profile. Please make that you really need or want your profile to be removed, all the data will be lost and cannot be recovered.
EditForm.RemovingConfirmation: Are you sure you want to remove your account? All of your data will be permanently removed. This action cannot be undone.

Salon.KeepInMind: Keep in mind, anyone can create discussions, make comments or reply but only registered users can edit/delete their own discussions or comments, replies cannot be edited nor deleted.
Salon.AsLoggedUser: Create a discussion or write your comments as a registered user by signing in

Salon.ClickToOpen: Click here to start a discussion
Salon.ContentRequired: Content is required and minimum 50 characters
